name: Shrimp Alfredo Pasta
author: LISSA MURR
summary: A wonderful shrimp pasta dish!  I came up with this on my own one night. You can change the amount of ingredients to your taste.
ingredients: 2 pounds fresh shrimp, peeled and deveined
½ small green bell pepper, diced
½ small red onion, finely chopped
directions: In a saucepan over low-temperature, heat the
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Add pasta and cook for 8  minutes or until al dente; drain
Boil shrimp in a large pot of water until they turn orange
Then place in bowl with melted butter
Let shrimp marinate for 15 to 30 minutes; remove
In a large skillet over medium heat, saute the green pepper and onion in a small amount of oil
Mix together the cooked pasta, shrimp, pepper-onion mixture and Alfredo sauce
Season with garlic powder and cumin
